text: Aur Allah Taalaa ney bani israeel say ehad-o-paymaan liya aur unhi mein say baara sardar hum ney muqarrar farmaye aur Allah Taalaa ney farma diya kay yaqeenan mein tumharay sath hun agar tum namaz qaeem rakho gay aur zakat detay raho gay aur meray rasoolon ko maantay raho gay aur unn ki madad kertay raho gay aur Allah Taalaa ko behtar qarz detay raho gay to yaqeenan mein tumhari buraiyan tum say door rakhoon ga aur tumhen unn jannaton mein ley jaon ga jin kay neechay chashmay beh rahey hain abb iss ehas-o-paymaan kay baad bhi tum mein say jo inkari ho jaye woh yaqeenan raah-e-raast say bhatak gaya
